longBusinessSummary: The Indian Hotels Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, and manages hotels, palaces, and resorts in India and internationally. The company operates hotels under the Taj, SeleQtions, Vivanta, Ginger, am√£ Stays & Trails, TAJ SATS, and QMIN brand names. It also offers air catering, trails, stays, bars, restaurants, clubs, salons, spas, food and beverages, and boutiques services. The Indian Hotels Company Limited was founded in 1868 and is based in Mumbai, India.
